document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">met </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">King </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Afternoon! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Crown </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">indeed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">Palm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">leaf </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Hat </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">barefoot, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I'm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">afraid! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">sure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">am </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Ermine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">wore </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Beneath </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">faded </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Jacket's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">blue </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">sure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">am, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">crest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">bore </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Within </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Jacket's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">pocket </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">too! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'twas </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">stately </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Earl </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Marquis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">go </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">grand! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Twas </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">possibly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Czar </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">petite </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">Pope, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">something </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">kind! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">tell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Horse </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">freckled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Monarch </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">held </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">rein </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Doubtless, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">estimable </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Beast, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">disposed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">run! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">such </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">wagon! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">While </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">live </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Dare </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">presume </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Another </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">such </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">vehicle </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">transported </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Two </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">other </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">ragged </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Princes </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">His </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">royal </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">state </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">partook! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Doubtless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">first </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">excursion </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">These </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">sovreigns </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">ever </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">took! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">question </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Royal </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Coach </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Round </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">which </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Footmen </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">wait </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Has </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">significance, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">high, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Barefoot </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">Estate! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: I met a king this afternoon!
